snippet: Thirty-six pictures by Benny Andrews are on display at Michael Rosenfeld Gallery.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews There Must be a Heaven exhibition featuring paintings of Benny Andrews at Michael Rosenfeld Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Thirty-six pictures by Benny Andrews are on display at Michael Rosenfeld Gallery.

headline.print_headline: Benny Andrews: ‘There Must Be a Heaven’
